record.description: Heed De Gaulle and Defy Hitler. During the time which General Charles De Gaulle, Free French leader, had set aside for five-minute standstill demonstration in protest against the German execution of hostages in France members of the American Student Union hanged Hitler in effigy at the University of Chicago. Alice Solomon (at the desk) takes names of those who joined the demonstration. [Photograph taken at the Reynolds Club Cloisters.]
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Paint on surface, fuzzy back, attached caption.
